alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 1:00AM AKST until March 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE... Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will continue through Thursday evening. The strongest winds and worst conditions are expected on Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
